title: Journal of the American Ceramic Society
aka: Journal of the American Ceramic Society: Ceramic Abstracts

contents.note: Publisher site (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-note: The notice for the first renewal associated with this journal, in the Periodicals section of the CCE, specifies 'Ceramic Abstracts', which was a section of the November 1, 1946 issue.  The original registration referenced in the CCE notice was for the entire issue.   We are not sure whether the renewal covers the entire issue, or just the Ceramic Abstracts section, so we have specified that issue for both the first renewed issue and the first renewed contribution. There are similar renewals associated with later issues.  Ceramic Abstracts has also sometimes been issued as its own periodical.
